md:
giải nghĩa từ "perk" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Perk (noun)

* Meaning: a special advantage or benefit that someone gets because of their job or position
* Example: "One of the perks of being a teacher is having summers off."
* Related words: benefit, advantage, privilege
* Antonyms: drawback, disadvantage

Perk (verb)

* Meaning: to become more cheerful or lively
* Example: "After a few cups of coffee, she perked up and was ready to go."
* Related words: brighten, cheer, liven
* Antonyms: droop, slump, sag

Perk (adjective)

* Meaning: lively and cheerful
* Example: "The perk atmosphere of the party made everyone feel welcome."
* Related words: lively, cheerful, upbeat
* Antonyms: dull, gloomy, depressing
